name: Alessandro Muraro
message: Kang is a talented and dependable team player, he can learn very fast and is always looking for ways to improve. I have been working with him for a period of time and I was amazed by the skills he has. He understands business contraints and time constraints, and is able to make good decisions in order to reach the goals needed. He's also a very good human, so it's a pleasure to work with him too. I would definitely recommend him to any company looking to add an excellent player to their team.

name: Tiff Lau
message: Prompt responses and excellent execution without much supervision

name: Henry Obringer
message: Kang is a pro and is easy to work with. Thank you!

name: Michele Silence
message: Kang was great to work with, was very quick and understood exactly what we needed. We will be using his services again when we need more work in this area.

name: Eike B. Post
message: It was an absolute pleasure to be working with Kang Wei as he did what he had written in the proposal, which is make the front end pixel perfect and even implement some changes. Also, he was always very promt and kind in his communications.

name: Michael Foster
message: 10/10. Kang is a multi-talented freelancer with excellent critical thinking and communication skills. We needed Kang's help for a research project and he delivered exactly what we asked for and more in a timely and efficient manner. I hope to work with Kang again in the future.

name: Kasivairavan Ramakrishnan
message: Kang is extremely knowledgeable and passionate about coding and web development. He is highly professional in his work. A great asset to any team.

name: Douglas Acosta
message: Working with Kang, has been a rewarding and productive experience, I have seen great quality and dedication in his daily work as a developer in general, also how gentle he is with the work environment. I recommend and trust Kang for any job.

name: Nazim Kerimbekov
message: It was an absolute pleasure to work with Kang. He did a great job at implementing all of the needed features and making my site look way better than I could have imagined. Looking forward on working with him again soon!
